articles.description: In an unusual move for any fandom, Red Dead Redemption 2 fans are uniting over their desire to have two expansions.
articles.content: Theres not a lot we can say about Red Dead Redemption that hasnt already been said before; collectively, both games are superb in their own, unique ways. Yes, theres always room to debate which is be… [+2103 chars]

articles.author: Hannah Rooke
articles.title: Now you can "poison" your images so they wreak havoc on AI generators - Digital Camera World
articles.description: Creators use new software to make their images "poison" AI generators, causing chaos and confusion
articles.content: AI-generated images often exploit artists' work without consent or compensation. It’s been an ongoing battle ever since the likes of DALL•E and Midjourney took off back in 2021, but creators might ha… [+4349 chars]
